getYieldThirdParty(address).details: Only specific addresses allowed by the admin can do this, and only 1:1 (i.e. the third party can only collect one specified address's rewards)

greylistAddress(address).details: This is a toggle, so it can re-enable to user as well

params._emittedToken: Address of the token being emitted as yield

setThirdPartyClaimer(address,address).details: For Convex, StakeDAO, etc whose contract addresses cannot claim for themselves. Admin set on a case-by-case basis

params._vePMXAggregator: The new address of the vePMX Aggregator

earned(address).notice: Amount of tokens claimaible as yield

eligibleCurrentVePMX(address).notice: Eligible vePMX for a given user. Only positions with locked vePMX can accrue yield, not expired positions

emittedToken().notice: ERC20 instance of the token being emitted

emittedTokenAddress().notice: Address of the token being emitted

fractionParticipating().notice: Fraction of the total Fraxtal-visible vePMX collecting yield

getYieldForDuration().notice: Total amount of yield for the duration (normally a week)

getYieldThirdParty(address).notice: Retrieve another address's yield. Only for specific cases (e.g. Convex, etc) where the mainnet contract cannot claim for itself

greylistAddress(address).notice: Greylist an address that is misbehaving

lastTimeYieldApplicable().notice: Last time the yield was accruing

lastUpdateTime().notice: Timestamp when the contract was last synced or had rewards deposited

notifyRewardAmount(uint256).notice: Deposit rewards. Only callable by privileged users

periodFinish().notice: Timestamp when the reward period ends

recoverERC20(address,uint256).notice: Added to support recovering LP Yield and other mistaken tokens from other systems to be distributed to holders

rewardNotifiers(address).notice: Mapping of addresses that are allowed to deposit reward tokens

setThirdPartyClaimer(address,address).notice: Allow a 3rd party address to claim the rewards of a specific staker

setYieldDuration(uint256).notice: Set the duration of the yield

setYieldRate(uint256,bool).notice: Used for manual reward rates. Only valid until the next notifyRewardAmount() or setYieldRate()

thirdPartyClaimers(address).notice: For Convex, StakeDAO, etc whose contract addresses cannot claim for themselves. Admin set on a case-by-case basis

toggleRewardNotifier(address).notice: Toggle an address as being able to be a reward notifier

totalComboVePMXSupplyStored().notice: Stored version of the total vePMX supply

totalVePMXParticipating().notice: Total amount of vePMX that was checkpointed and is earning

userIsInitialized(address).notice: If the user was initialized or not

userVePMXCheckpointed(address).notice: Last stored vePMX balance for the user

userVePMXEndpointCheckpointed(address).notice: The stored shortest endpoint of any of the user's vePMX positions. You will need to re-checkpoint after any lock expires if you want to keep earning.

userYieldPerTokenPaid(address).notice: Accumulator for tracking user-specific rewards paid

vePMXAggregator().notice: Aggregator contract that sums a user's vePMX from multiple sources

yieldDuration().notice: Duration of the period, in seconds

yieldPerVePMXStored().notice: Accumulator for tracking contract-wide rewards paid

yieldRate().notice: Emission rate of tokens, in tokens per second

yields(address).notice: Last stored version of earned(). Set to 0 on yield claim and to earned() on a checkpoint.
